trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: Converte le istanze di altri tipi in e da istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supporta la conversione da e verso i seguenti tipi: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: Descrive le informazioni di contesto di un tipo.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Tipo dell'oggetto di origine valutato per la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se una classe può essere convertita da un tipo specificato in un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the converter can convert from the specified type to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il convertitore è in grado di eseguire la conversione dal tipo specificato in un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supporta la conversione da e verso i seguenti tipi: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: Descrive le informazioni di contesto di un tipo.

trans-unit.source: The desired type that this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Tipo desiderato per cui questa istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> viene valutata per la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> can be converted to a different type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> può essere convertita in un tipo diverso.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the converter can convert this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> to the specified type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il convertitore può convertire questa istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> nel tipo specificato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supporta la conversione da e verso i seguenti tipi: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: Descrive le informazioni di contesto di un tipo.

trans-unit.source: Cultural specific information that should be respected during conversion.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni culturali specifiche che devono essere rispettate durante la conversione.

trans-unit.source: The object being converted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a specified object to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di convertire un oggetto specificato in un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> that is created from the converted <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> creata dall'oggetto <paramref name="source" /> convertito.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supporta la conversione da e verso i seguenti tipi: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> object is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <paramref name="source" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> object is not <see langword="null" /> and is not a valid type that can be converted to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <paramref name="source" /> non è <see langword="null" /> e non è un tipo valido che può essere convertito in una struttura <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: Descrive le informazioni di contesto di un tipo.

trans-unit.source: Cultural specific information that should be respected during conversion.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni culturali specifiche che devono essere rispettate durante la conversione.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: L'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: The type that this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> is converted to.
trans-unit.target: Tipo in cui viene convertita questa istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> to a specified type.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di convertire un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" /> in un tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The object that is created from the converted instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che viene creato dall'istanza convertita di <see cref="T:System.Windows.GridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supporta la conversione da e verso i seguenti tipi: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is not one of the valid types for conversion.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" /> non è uno dei tipi validi per la conversione.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> è <see langword="null" />.
